ygData.subject: Arlena
ygData.msgSnippet: --All this talk about Mistmoore has resurfaced a question i have had. Arlena. Lord Grimrot s poor misguided love. Now at one point in time it was believed that
ygData.messageBody:
--All this talk about Mistmoore has resurfaced a
question i have had.

Arlena.

Lord Grimrot's poor misguided love.

Now at one point in time it was believed that Arlena
was actually a named gypsy (but NOT Arlena)in MM. Kill
her, bring her lute to Grimrot and you get a mold and
note for that electrum bladed whatever.

Since then, the electrum thingy was moved to the
Avenging Caitiff.

Now, i have yet to actually step foot in MM. Though
that trip is near. But i know several who have scoured
MM and no Arlena has been sited.

Has anyone heard anything about an NPC named Arlena
either in or around MM?

And also, has anyone gotten a "lute" quest from
Grimrot, as opposed to the "Bones" one that i have
received? To recap that: Grimmy wants you to find
Arlena and return her bones. I have a screenshot of
this to prove my sanity.

Now there have been NPCs that my friends were unable
to get to or defeat. One was a Princess, cloaked
vampyre (sp?). Maybe one of these were Arlena in
disguise?

Has anyone questioned the Avenging Caitiff about
Arlena? Are there any other NPCs in there that will
speak with us without the usual "YOU MUST DIE" message
following?

Just curious as to what others have found..


Bathory D'Allatu


=====
